Definition.WordDefinition: svelte adj 1: showing a high degree of refinement and the assurance that comes from wide social experience; "his polished manner"; "maintained an urbane tone in his letters" [syn: {polished}, {refined}, {urbane}] 2: gracefully slender; moving and bending with ease [syn: {lissome}, {lissom}, {lithe}, {lithesome}, {slender}, {supple}, {sylphlike}]
